messages.subject: Re: sleeping containers
messages.msgSnippet: I know this question is for Bridget but it reminds me of when my son and I first moved to California a few years ago. He spent two days taking two carboard
messages.messageBody:
I know this question is for Bridget but it reminds me
of when my son and I first moved to California a few
years ago. He spent two days taking two
carboard boxes, decorating them, attaching them,
making doorways in them and then slept in them for a
few days. On the floor, next to my bed.

Geez, if anyone saw him they would of taken him away
and called CPS instantly!!!!

*smile*

k>>>>

LOL!! My friend's son slept in the empty refrigerator
box for weeks. He moved to his bed after that for a
week then got a new laundry basket and slept in that
for 5 days. Now he's sleeping on the floor. Where's he
going to end up next is the common joke between us!

Meghan
